title: Drawing, "Anne Wrigley Yacht: Night Table", ca. 1934
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: # 7972
description: Perspective drawing of a night table for stateroom of Anne Wrigley's yacht. Dark reflective surface, probably Bakelite, drawer below with horizontal, rectangular pull, two-door cabinet below with horizontal, rectangular pull. Cabinet and drawer have rounded edges at sides. Night stand on small base of darker wood. Panel behind night stand (probably affixed to wall) with reflector light at top. Long, horizontal light with rounded shade.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Anne Wrigley Yacht: Night Table", ca. 1934.
ca. 1934. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-549.
